flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Almost incapablenof moving, thisnPOKéMON can onlyfharden its shellnto protect itselfnfrom predators.
Almost incapablenof moving, thisnPOKéMON can onlyfharden its shellnto protect itselfnfrom predators.
Able to move onlynslightly. Whennendangered, itfmay stick out itsnstinger and poisonnits enemy.
Although it is ancocoon, it cannmove a little. Itfcan extend itsnpoison barb if itnis attacked.
From this form,nit will grow intonan adult. As itsfbody becomes soft­ner, the externalnshell hardens.
Nearly incapablenof movement, itnleans againstfstout trees whilenwaiting for itsnevolution.

KAKUNA remains virtually immobile as itnclings to a tree. However, on theninside, it is extremely busy as itfprepares for its coming evolution.nThis is evident from how hot the shellnbecomes to the touch.

KAKUNA remains virtually immobile as itnclings to a tree. However, on theninside, it is extremely busy as itfprepares for its coming evolution.nThis is evident from how hot the shellnbecomes to the touch.
It remains virtually immobile while itnclings to a tree. However, on the inside,nit busily prepares for evolution. This isnevident from how hot its shell becomes.
This POKéMON is in a temporary stagenwhile making its body. It is almostncompletely unable to move on its own.
Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMONncan only harden its shell to protectnitself when it is in danger.
While awaiting evolution, itnhides from predators undernleaves and in nooks of branches.
While awaiting evolution, itnhides from predators undernleaves and in nooks of branches.
While awaiting evolution, itnhides from predators undernleaves and in nooks of branches.
Although it is a cocoon, it cannmove a little. It can extend itsnpoison barb if it is attacked.
From this form, it will grow intonan adult. As its body becomes softer,nthe external shell hardens.
Il se cache sous les feuilles et lesnbranches pour fuir les prédateursnen attendant d’évoluer.
While awaiting evolution, itnhides from predators undernleaves and in nooks of branches.
Il se cache sous les feuilles et lesnbranches pour fuir les prédateursnen attendant d’évoluer.
While awaiting evolution, itnhides from predators undernleaves and in nooks of branches.
While awaiting evolution, itnhides from predators undernleaves and in nooks of branches.
While awaiting evolution, itnhides from predators undernleaves and in nooks of branches.
じぶんでは　ほとんど　うごけないがnあぶないときは　かたくなってnみを　まもっているようだ。
스스로는 거의 움직일 수 없지만n위험할 때는 단단해져서n몸을 보호하고 있는 것 같다.
Incapable de se déplacer de lui-même, il se défend enndurcissant sa carapace.
Dieses Pokémon kann sich kaum bewegen.nBei drohender Gefahr verhärtet es seinen Panzer.
Casi incapaz de moverse, este Pokémon solo puedenendurecer su caparazón para protegerse.
Quasi incapace di muoversi, questo Pokémon puònsolo indurire il proprio guscio per proteggersi.
Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can onlynharden its shell to protect itself when it isnin danger.
自分では　ほとんど　動けないがn危ないときは　硬くなってn身を守っているようだ。
てんてきに　みつからないようにnはっぱの　うらや　えだの　すきまにnかくれて　しんかの　ときを　まつ。
천적에게 발견되지 않도록n잎사귀 뒷면이나 가지의 틈새에n숨어서 진화할 때를 기다린다.
Il se cache sous les feuilles et les branches pour fuirnles prédateurs en attendant d’évoluer.
Während es auf seine Entwicklung wartet, versteckt esnsich unter Blättern und zwischen Ästen.
Se esconde de sus atacantes entre las ramas de losnárboles mientras espera a evolucionar.
Si nasconde dai predatori dietro le foglie e fra i rami,nin attesa dell’evoluzione.
While awaiting evolution, it hides from predatorsnunder leaves and in nooks of branches.
天敵に　見つからないようにn葉っぱの　裏や　枝の　すきまに　隠れてn進化の　ときを　待つ。
ほとんど　うごかず　きに　つかまっているがnなかでは　しんかの　じゅんびで　おおいそがし。nその　しょうこに　からだが　あつくなっているぞ。
거의 움직이지 않고 나무에 매달려 있지만n내부는 진화 준비로 굉장히 바쁜 상태다.n그 증거로 몸이 뜨거워져 있다.

Coconfort est la plupart du temps immobile et restenaccroché à un arbre. Cependant, intérieurement, il estntrès actif, car il se prépare pour sa prochaine évolution.nEn touchant sa carapace, on peut sentir sa chaleur.
Kokuna bewegt sich kaum, wenn es an einem Baum haftet.nIn seinem Inneren jedoch regt sich einiges, da es sich aufnseine bevorstehende Entwicklung vorbereitet. Dabei wirdnseine Schale sehr heiß.

Kakuna permanece prácticamente inmóvil al encaramarse anlos árboles, aunque la actividad interna de su organismontiene un ritmo frenético, pues se prepara para su evolución.nPrueba de esto es la alta temperatura de su caparazón.
Kakuna rimane praticamente immobile abbarbicato agli alberi.nTuttavia, internamente è intento a preparare la sua futuranevoluzione. Lo si può capire dall’intensità del calorensviluppato dal guscio.

Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree.nHowever, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares fornits coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shellnbecomes to the touch.
ほとんど　動かず　木に　つかまっているがn中では　進化の　準備で　大忙し。nその　証拠に　体が　熱くなっているぞ。
ほとんど　うごかず　きに　つかまっているがnなかでは　しんかの　じゅんびで　おおいそがし。nその　しょうこに　からだが　あつくなっているぞ。
거의 움직이지 않고 나무에 매달려 있지만n내부는 진화 준비로 굉장히 바쁜 상태다.n그 증거로 몸이 뜨거워져 있다.

Coconfort est la plupart du temps immobile et restenaccroché à un arbre. Cependant, intérieurement, il estntrès actif, car il se prépare pour sa prochaine évolution.nEn touchant sa carapace, on peut sentir sa chaleur.
Kokuna bewegt sich kaum, wenn es sich an einen Baum heftet.nIn seinem Inneren jedoch regt sich einiges, da es sich aufnseine bevorstehende Entwicklung vorbereitet. Dabei wird seinenSchale sehr heiß.

Kakuna permanece prácticamente inmóvil al encaramarse anlos árboles, aunque la actividad interna de su organismontiene un ritmo frenético, pues se prepara para su evolución.nPrueba de esto es la alta temperatura de su caparazón.
Kakuna rimane praticamente immobile abbarbicato agli alberi.nTuttavia, internamente è intento a preparare la sua futuranevoluzione. Lo si può capire dall’intensità del calorensviluppato dal guscio.

Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree.nHowever, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it preparesnfor its coming evolution.nThis is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
ほとんど　動かず　木に　つかまっているがn中では　進化の　準備で　大忙し。nその　証拠に　体が　熱くなっているぞ。
じぶんでは　ほとんど　うごけないがnあぶなくなると　ハリをだしてnどくを　あたえることも　あるらしい。
스스로는 거의 움직일 수 없지만n위험해지면 침을 세워서n독을 뿜을 때도 있는 듯하다.
雖然幾乎動也動不了，n但如果遭遇到了危險，n有時似乎會豎起毒刺來反抗。
Il peut à peine bouger. Quand il est menacé,nil sort parfois son aiguillon pour empoisonnernses ennemis.
Obwohl es sich kaum bewegen kann, ist es beinGefahr in der Lage, einen Stachel auszufahren,nmit dem es seine Gegner vergiftet.
Aunque es casi incapaz de moverse, en casonde sentirse amenazado puede envenenar a losnenemigos con su aguijón.
È molto limitato nei movimenti. Se si sentenminacciato, estrae il pungiglione e avvelenanil nemico.
Able to move only slightly. When endangered, itnmay stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
自分では　ほとんど　動けないがn危なくなると　ハリを出してn毒を　与えることも　あるらしい。
虽然几乎动也动不了，n但是如果遇到了危险，n有时似乎会竖起毒刺来反抗。
じぶんでは　ほとんど　うごけないがnあぶなくなると　ハリをだしてnどくを　あたえることも　あるらしい。
